text: The Vaccinium uliginosum is the scientific name for bog bilberry, bog blueberry, northern bilberry, western blueberry. The Vaccinium uliginosum is an Eurasia and North American plant in the group Vaccinium. It lives in cold temperate areas. You can eat the berries raw or cooked, you can also make jelly and pies with it. It can grow to 10-75cm tall with round stems. It has oval leaves with blue-green veins. Category:Berries Category:Vaccinium
title: Vaccinium uliginosum
